mapper.insert: INSERT INTO price_lock_company (Id, lockCompanyId, serverType, typeName, Price,parentType) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lockCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serverType}, #{typeName,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{parentType,jdbcType=INTEGER});
mapper.select:
select
from price_lock_company LEFT JOIN t_locksmith_enterprise ON t_locksmith_enterprise.`Id`=price_lock_company.`lockCompanyId` where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND t_locksmith_enterprise.AuditFlag = 1

SELECT t_locksmith_enterprise.`Id` as id,t_locksmith_enterprise.`EnterpriseName` as enterpriseName ,t_locksmith_enterprise.`EnterprisePhone` as enterprisePhone ,price_lock_company.Id as lockCompanyPriceId ,price_lock_company.serverType,price_lock_company.typeName,price_lock_company.Price as price ,price_lock_company.parentType,price_lock_company.createTime,price_lock_company.updateTime FROM t_locksmith_enterprise LEFT JOIN price_lock_company ON t_locksmith_enterprise.`Id`=price_lock_company.`lockCompanyId` WHERE t_locksmith_enterprise.Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT t_locksmith_enterprise.`Id` as id,t_locksmith_enterprise.`EnterpriseName` as enterpriseName ,t_locksmith_enterprise.`EnterprisePhone` as enterprisePhone,price_lock_company.Id as lockCompanyPriceId ,price_lock_company.serverType,price_lock_company.typeName,price_lock_company.Price as price ,price_lock_company.parentType,price_lock_company.createTime,price_lock_company.updateTime FROM t_locksmith_enterprise LEFT JOIN price_lock_company ON t_locksmith_enterprise.`Id`=price_lock_company.`lockCompanyId` WHERE 1=1 AND price_lock_company.Price IS NOT NULL AND t_locksmith_enterprise.AuditFlag = 1
AND t_locksmith_enterprise.EnterpriseName like concat ('%', #{enterpriseName},'%')
AND t_locksmith_enterprise.EnterprisePhone like concat ('%', #{enterprisePhone},'%')
